“Sin descanso. Sin misericordia. Sin importar lo que pase.” —Inscripción del monumento
“Nessun riposo. Nessuna pietà. Nessuna eccezione.” —Iscrizione celebrativa
「休息も慈悲も与えぬ。何があってもだ。」 —碑文
“휴식도 없고 자비도 없다. 어떤 경우에도.” —기념비 비문
«Без устали. Без пощады. Без тени сомнения». — Мемориальная надпись
“Sem descanso. Sem piedade. Não importa o que aconteça.” — Inscrição do memorial

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Creatures you control have flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, and protection from black and from red.
Les créatures que vous contrôlez ont le vol, l'initiative, la vigilance, le piétinement, la célérité, la protection contre le noir et la protection contre le rouge.
Las criaturas que controlas tienen las habilidades de volar, dañar primero, vigilancia, arrollar, prisa, protección contra negro y protección contra rojo.
Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, haben Flugfähigkeit, Erstschlag, Wachsamkeit, Trampelschaden, Eile, Schutz vor Schwarz und Schutz vor Rot.
Le creature che controlli hanno volare, attacco improvviso, cautela, travolgere, rapidità e protezione dal nero e dal rosso.
あなたがコントロールするクリーチャーは、飛行と先制攻撃と警戒とトランプルと速攻とプロテクション（黒）とプロテクション（赤）を持つ。
당신이 조종하는 생물들은 비행, 선제공격, 경계, 돌진, 신속 및 흑색과 적색으로부터 보호 능력을 가진다.
Существа под вашим контролем имеют Полет, Первый удар, Бдительность, Пробивной удар, Ускорение и Защиту от черного и от красного.
As criaturas que você controla têm voar, iniciativa, vigilância, atropelar, ímpeto, proteção contra o preto e proteção contra o vermelho.
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local filtered_obj = FilteredCard() if filtered_obj ~= nil then filtered_obj:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_FLYING, 1 ) filtered_obj:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_FIRST_STRIKE, 1 ) filtered_obj:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_VIGILANCE, 1 ) filtered_obj:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_TRAMPLE, 1 ) filtered_obj:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_HASTE, 1 ) end

local filtered_obj = FilteredCard() if filtered_obj ~= nil then local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddColour( COLOUR_BLACK ) filter:AddColour( COLOUR_RED ) filtered_obj:Protection() end
